desc: Cave goats are the size of a spaniel and have dog-like paws rather than hooves. Despite being quadrupeds, they are accomplished climbers of the steep and uneven confines of the Underworld. Cave goats are loyal, if a bit surly, and strong, making them a favorite companion of Underworld travelers.
name: Cave Goat

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The cave goat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Sturdy Climber
special_abilities.desc: The cave goat has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to climb rocky surfaces.
